Stylish, Two-Column Jekyll Theme

POSTS PROJECTS

About Theme

This theme is Jekyll port of vangeltzo.com (by Vangelis Tzortzis).

To learn how to install and use this theme check out the installation guide for more information.

If you have a question, find a bug, or just want to say hi, please open an issue on GitHub.
